data.decision: SuperAGI MCP expansion priority: Phase 1 (Core) - Puppeteer/Playwright, Google Workspace, E2B Sandbox. Phase 2 (Productivity) - Slack, Notion, Better Search. Phase 3 (Advanced) - Qdrant Memory, Postgres/Supabase, Sequential Thinking.
data.rationale: Phase 1 fills critical gaps: browser automation (screenshots, forms), email/calendar (Google Workspace), secure code execution (E2B). Phase 2 adds team productivity. Phase 3 enables advanced memory and database operations. Prioritized by impact on daily workflows.
data.context: Research on MCP tools from awesome-mcp-servers (80.7k stars), official docs, and community guides
